import React from "react" class LoginForm extends React.Component { state = { email: "", password: "", passwordConfirm: "", errors: {}, } handleTextInputChange = ({target}) => this.setState({ [target.name]: target.value, errors: {...this.state.errors, [target.name]: ""}, }) handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) } render() { return (

Login

) } } export default LoginForm
